outcome: The Propaganda Wars: Council factions battle for narrative control over the BCI collapse, flooding the city with competing stories that deepen public division and sow civic unrest.

events.description: Every major news display loops edited Council footage aggressively blaming rival factions for the BCI malfunction. Hacktivist overlays make the broadcasts even more inflammatory.
Graffiti, flyers, and counter-statements fill the streets. Public squares become battlegrounds for competing rallies, each group claiming to defend Halden's true vision.
Leaked messages reveal that BCI reports were regularly rewritten and scores adjusted to serve political ends before Halden's death, further eroding trust.
Spontaneous mass protests break out after video evidence shows a faction leader ordering a BCI flag against a rival. Police hesitate to intervene, fearing escalation.
